item.title: Java Basic
item.author: serialt
item.description: Java 配置settings 默认读取位置 ~/.m2 curl -O https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/archetype-catalog.xml <settings xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/SETTINGS/1.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/SETTINGS/1.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/settings-1.0.0.xsd"> <localRepository>/home/sugar/.m2/repository</localRepository> <mirrors> <mirror> <id>alimaven</id> <mirrorOf>central</mirrorOf> <name>aliyun maven</name> <url>https://maven.aliyun.com/nexus/content/groups/public/</url> </mirror> </mirrors> <profiles> <profile> <id>archetype-catalog</id> <activation> <activeByDefault>true</activeByDefault> </activation> <properties> <archetypeCatalog>file:///Users/sugar/.m2/archetype-catalog.xml</archetypeCatalog> </properties> </profile> </profiles> </settings> # 手动下载依赖 mvn -B -f pom.xml -s /usr/share/maven/ref/settings.xml dependency:resolve # 打包 mvn package 一、基
